column4: Hey guys, I am running Ubuntu 8.10 on my new laptop, however, I have a really old laptop that can't handle Ubuntu. Is there any way to just install the kernel operate the old laptop from the command line only, without installing xwindows?
you could just tell X to not start.. or install  the whole desktop and enable a lighter window manager/desktop
or use some uber-light disrto if your system is reall old/small
